chapters.title: Chapter 53: The Feast of Lights
chapters.info: Carilo, p. 660 (931)—A Warder, on duty guarding Min the night Rand saw her and went into a rage because they had captured her as well as him; he killed a Warder with his bare hands and mortally wounded another (he died in Healing) with the sword of the one who fell, all in the moments the sisters spent in shock before they could tie him up with the Power.
